mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sys_org_code, sfzmhm, hphm, sqyy, slsl, sjr, lxdh, sf, cs, qx, jddz, zt, shr, shsj, bz, openid, shyy, ywmc, lsh, sfbr, sllb, dh
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from veh_screw
order by ${orderByClause}

select sys_org_code,sfzmhm,hphm, count(hphm) as sumsl from veh_screw
group by hphm,sys_org_code,sfzmhm having sumsl>0;

SELECT a.sys_org_code, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM veh_screw WHERE a.sys_org_code = sys_org_code and sllb='1' group by sys_org_code) xssl, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM veh_screw WHERE a.sys_org_code = sys_org_code and sllb='2' group by sys_org_code) xxsl FROM veh_screw a
GROUP BY a.sys_org_code
